revised_title: Ancient Urns and Artifacts Discovered in North Elmham, Norfolk
tldr: A large number of ancient urns were discovered in North Elmham, Norfolk, containing various artifacts such as broken bones, pieces of glass, and brass items. The urns are believed to be Roman, suggesting the presence of a Roman station or colony in the area. The author presents these findings to the Royal Society and seeks their opinion on the history and purpose of this settlement.
